resources.string:
Welcome to Kanye Quotes, the app that brings you a curated selection of the most iconic and thought-provoking quotes from Kanye West.

 Discover new perspectives, find inspiration and get a glimpse into the mind of a true visionary with random quotes presented each time you open the app.

 Save your favorite quotes for later and share them with friends!

 Developed by Theo , this app is a tribute to Kanye West.
